name: Cereal Holly Wreaths
description: No cooking required! Enjoy these cookies that are shaped into decorative wreaths using Cheerios® Cereal and candy for a Christmas-time dessert that’s ready in just an hour!
recipeIngredient: 1  cup (6 1/2 oz.) green candy melts or coating wafers

recipeInstructions.text: Line 1 cookie sheet with foil. Place cereal in large bowl. Melt candy melts as directed on package. Pour melted candy over cereal; toss to mix.

For each wreath, drop about 3 tablespoons mixture onto foil-lined cookie sheet. With fingers, shape into 3-inch wreath with 1-inch center opening. Immediately decorate with cinnamon candies. Let stand about 5 minutes or until set.
